wkit-log.Body:
Can you post your error log file? it's found here:
`%appdata%\REDModding\WolvenKit.`

redmod-steam.Body:
```* Navigate to _Cyberpunk 2077_
* Click **Play**
* Click the **Settings** button and **Enable mods**
* Click **Play** (Do not skip this)
* A window will open showing progress on mod deployment.```
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CDPR-Modding-Documentation/Cyberpunk-Modding-Docs/main/.gitbook/assets/gog_prelauncher.png

redmod-gog.Body:
```* Open GOG - _Cyberpunk 2077_
* Click **Manage Installation** -> **Configure ...**
* Open the **Features** Tab
* Select **Enable mods**
* Click **OK**
* Play the game
* A window will open showing progress on mod deployment.```
https://raw.githubusercontent.com/CDPR-Modding-Documentation/Cyberpunk-Modding-Docs/main/.gitbook/assets/redmod_gog.png
